title: Cedar Creek & Belle Grove National Historical Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       National Park Service Buildings   The Cedar Creek and Belle Grove Visitor Contact Station and Headquarters buildings are handicap accessible. Service animals are welcome in all of our park buildings and on the grounds. If you have any questions about accessibility accommodations, please call ahead to Cedar Creek and Belle Grove Visitor Contact Station - (540) 869-3051.      Â    Partners To find out about our partner sites accessibility, please contact them directly: Belle Grove Plantation - 540-869-2028 Cedar Creek Battlefield Foundation - 540-869-2064 Hupp's Hill Civil War Park - 540-465-5884
